description: Number of 4-line partitions of n decreasing across rows.
comments: a(n) is the number of unlabeled graphs on n nodes whose connected components are a path or a cycle. - Geoffrey Critzer, Nov 28 2011
references: M. S. Cheema and W. E. Conway, Numerical investigation of certain asymptotic results in the theory of partitions, Math. Comp., 26 (1972), 999-1005.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
Herbert Wilf, Generatingfunctiontology, Academic Press, 1994, page 106.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
